description.value: This handheld unit includes an extendable wand tipped with a sampling nozzle, and can be easily operated with a single hand. It grants a +4 circumstance bonus to Engineering, Mysticism, and Physical Science checks to identify an unknown @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.ZaS9H4rwaFIQTUBC]{Drug}, medicinal, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.ZaS9H4rwaFIQTUBC]{poison}, or other chemical substance.

modifiers.name: Chemalyzer
modifiers.notes: The Chemalyzer grants a +4 circumstance bonus to Engineering, Mysticism, and Physical Science checks to identify an unknown Drug, medicinal, poison, or other chemical substance.
